verbs.description: [ARG0: swimmers] [V: cross] [ARG1: us - mexico border] [ARGM-PRP: to support immigrants] twelve athletes swam across the border from the united states to mexico in a show of solidarity with immigrants amid a charged political climate israel kim chambers mexico south africa rosarito beach mexican navy united states border patrol imperial beach new zealand tijuana
